dialogues.text: Don't know. But the Arena's mainframe for the Obedience Disks have been deactivated and the slaves have armed themselves.

dialogues.text: Oh! I don't like that word!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown

dialogues.text: No. Why would I not like "mainframe?" No, the "S" word.

dialogues.text: Hey, so listen, we should talk.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I disagree. Open communication was never our family's forte.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You have no idea. I've had quite the revelation since we spoke last. The door opens, revealing a bunch of guards.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Thor and Loki heft up two Sakaarian guns.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hello!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hi! Thor and Loki BLAST all the guards, moving to another doo

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Odin brought us together, it's almost poetic that his death should split us apart. We might as well be strangers now. "Two sons of the crown" set adrift. A guard tries to ambush Loki through the door.   Thor TAK OUT the guard.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Thought you didn't want to talk about it?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Thor and Loki are going up.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Here's the thing. I'm probably better off staying here on Sakaar.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That's exactly what I was thinking.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ...Did you just agree with me?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: This place is perfect for you. It's savage, chaotic, lawless. Brother, you're going to do GREAT here.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Do you truly think so little of me? Thor pauses, considers his brother.   Then:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Loki, I thought the world of you. I thought we were gonna fight side by side forever. But, at the end of the day, you're you, I'm me...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: THOR (CONT'D)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I don't know, maybe there's still good in you, but let's be honest, our paths diverged a long time ago. Loki is wounded by Thor's willingness to discard him. his feelings with: LOKI

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's probably for the best that we never see one another again. Beat.   Thor pats Loki affectionately on the shoulder. Hold on Loki. Did Thor just get through to him? THOR

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That's what you always wanted. Beat.   Then: THOR (CONT'D)

dialogues.text: Hey, let's do "Get Help."

dialogues.text: What? THOR

dialogues.text: No. THOR

dialogues.text: Come on, you love it.

dialogues.text: It's great. IT works every time. LOKI

dialogues.text: Do you have a better plan?

dialogues.text: No. THOR

dialogues.text: We're doing it.

dialogues.text: Get help! Please! My brother, he's dying. A small group of Sakaarian guards turn toward Thor and Lo One guard aims his gun at them.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Classic.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I still hate it. It's humiliating.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Not for me, it's not.

dialogues.text: Which one's the ship she told us to get?

dialogues.text: (points)

dialogues.text: The Commodore. The COMMODORE starship. Brand new, solidly built, sleek. As they walk towards it a DUPLICATE LOKI FORMS and LAGS BEHIND. The Loki walking with Thor is an illusion.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Though I feel it won't make much of a difference...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We follow the real Loki as he slinks away towards the security system panel. He activates the panel and brings screen that will set off all the alarms palace-wide!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh, Loki. Loki turns to see Thor looking not at all surprised.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I know I've betrayed you many times before, but this time it's truly nothing personal. The reward for your capture will set me up nicely. He triggers the alarm.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Never one for sentiment, were you?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Easier to let it burn. But then Loki sees Thor holding up a fob device. Loki realizes that Thor affixed an Obedience Disk on him in th heart-to-heart moment.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I agree. BZZZT! Thor ZAPS Loki and HOLDS DOWN the button. Loki HIT the ground, WRITHING in pain. Thor approaches. Pause.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh brother, you're becoming predictable. I trust you, you betray me. Round and round in circles we go. Thor continues to "think about it" for a beat while Loki convulses in agony on the floor. Finally, Thor kneels dow

dialogues.text: See, Loki, life is about, it's about growth. It's about change. But you seem to just wanna stay the same. I guess what I'm trying to say is that you'll always be the God of Mischief, but you could be more. I'll just put this over here for you.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Thor places the fob on top of the security panel, so clos but so far from Loki's paralyzed reach.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Anyway, I got places to be so good luck.

dialogues.text: All right, I can figure this out. It's just another spaceship.

dialogues.text: Shouldn't we be shooting back or something?

dialogues.text: Yes, we should. (into the radio:)

dialogues.text: Where are the guns on this ship?

dialogues.text: There aren't any. It's a leisure vessel.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Did she just say the Grandmaster uses it for orgies?

dialogues.text: Yeah. Don't touch anything. CLUNK! CLUNK! CLUNK! More fire from behind.

dialogues.text: No! Thor experiences a brief instant of heartbreak/devastatio ...but then notices a spec coming out of the explosion. THWACK! Val hits the ship's windshield and grabs hold! Residual smoke wafting off of her.

dialogues.text: Thor pilots the ship out of the city into the Wastelands six Sakaarian fighter ships race after them in formation. The following dogfight will proceed across the Wastelands then out over the Sakaarian Ocean.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Val is still on the windshield. GUNFIRE! One of the pursuing ships WINGS the Commodore, causing it to LURCH.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Get inside!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: In a minute! Val pulls herself up and then RUNS DOWN THE ROOF OF THE S Thor and Banner follow the THUMPING of her footsteps.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: In full sprint, Val LEAPS OFF and- -LANDS HARD on the lead Sakaarian ship! Val begins TEARIN into the enemy ship with her bare hands!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Thor and Banner exchange a look.   Pause.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I should probably go and help. Thor abruptly exits, leaving Banner at the ship's control

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Here, take the wheel.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No. I don't know how to fly one of these.

dialogues.text: You're a scientist.   Use one of your PhDs.

dialogues.text: None of them are for flying alien spaceships!

dialogues.text: Banner is frantically STEERING the ship, doing his best t dodge all the incoming fire. He peels away and is followe by Topaz, who is in her own chase-ship. Banner notices a button with a little explosion icon.

dialogues.text: Okay, come on. There's gotta be a gun on this thing. That looks like a gun. Banner PRESSES the button.

dialogues.text: The ship's lighting changes, like a disco effect. Weird d music BLASTS over the PA, followed by Grandmaster's voice

dialogues.text: It's MY BIRTHDAY! It's MY BIRTHDAY! It's MY BIRTHDAY. Banner is so confused. Then we hear FIREWORKS.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown

dialogues.text: Thor and Valkyrie join Banner in the cockpit.

dialogues.text: Guys, we're coming up on the Devil's Anus!

dialogues.text: KORG and MIEK enter, leading a group of gladiator rebels. Korg sees and then points to the SUPERCRUISER.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: There she is. Our ticket out of here. Hey, what's this?

dialogues.text: The OBEDIENCE DISK FOB on the ground.   He picks it up. Korg then notices LOKI, TWITCHING and CONVULSING on the ground. He's barely made any progress towards the fob. Loki locks eyes with Korg, a desperate and furious plea. Korg looks at Loki, then at the fob, then back to Loki. Loki gives Korg a maniacal, pleading look. Korg gets it.   He deactivates the obedience disk. Loki stands, dusts himself off.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Thank you.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hey man, we're about to jump on that ginormous spaceship. You wanna come?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You do seem like you're in desperate need of leadership.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Why thank you.

dialogues.text: leaning against FENRIS, her GIANT WOLF.

dialogues.text: Asgardians, some misguided soul has stolen the Bifrost sword. Tell us where it is, or there will be consequences. Bad ones. dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Well? Hela points to an Asgardian woman off camera.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You. Hela's butchers approach the crowd and find the Asgardian woman. Skurge closes his eyes and looks downward.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No! Stop! Hela's butchers pull the Asgardian woman to the steps. Th shove her and she falls tot he floor. The woman is on her hands and knees as Skurge turns to her. She trembles as Skurge holds his battle axe with both hands.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Well?   Executioner?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wait! I know where the sword is.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Commodore nears the end of the wormhole and is- -SPIT OUT into the calmness of outer space.

dialogues.text: Banner, Thor, and Valkyrie are all unconscious. Banner wa up and looks outside, the stars reflected in the windshie Thor and Valkyrie wake up. Outside they see- -THE REALM OF ASGARD, a flat city in the middle of an isl floating in space.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (mixed emotions)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I never thought I'd be back here. The ship descends into the clouds above Asgard.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I thought it'd be nicer. I mean, not that it's not nice. It's just, it's on fire.

dialogues.text: Here, up here in the mountains. A projected map on the console shows the mountain where t stronghold is located. There is a red dot in the mountain indicating where the Asgardian citizens are.

dialogues.text: Heat signatures. People clustered together. Hela's coming for them.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Okay, drop me off at the palace and I'll draw her away.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And get yourself killed?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The people trapped down there are all that matters. While I'm dealing with Hela, I need you two to help get everyone off Asgard.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: How the hell are we supposed to do that?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I have a man on the ground.

dialogues.text: Heimdall looks to the Asgardian Citizens.

dialogues.text: Asgard. She's here.

dialogues.text: Now the ship has guns.

dialogues.text: I'll take it from here. Thor produces a bundle of FABRIC WITH GOLD AND WHITE PLAT

dialogues.text: I found this in the armory. Val immediately recognizes its significance. She doesn't want to be affected by this gesture, but can't help it. They share a look as the Commodore lifts off into the air Before she's out of earshot, Val calls down:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: "Your majesty." Don't die.    You know what I mean. The Commodore flies away, leaving Thor on the balcony.

dialogues.text: Hela is about to throttle Skurge when- -A LOUD GONG SOUND. It's coming from far away, but the de note resonates across the land. GONG-GONG-GONG-GONG! Hela looks to the Palace, her eyes narrowing with rage.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Find Thor on the throne holding GUNGNIR - THE KING'S SPEA Odin's signature spear. SLAMMING the butt of it on the ground. GONG...GONG... Hela steps into the throne room.   Headdress & cowl o Thor stops the GONGING when he sees Hela.

dialogues.text: Sister. Smiling, Hela gradually crosses the huge space towards Th

dialogues.text: You're still alive.

dialogues.text: I love what you've done with the place. Redecorating, I see.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It seems our father's solution to every problem was to cover it up.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Or to cast it out. (then:)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He told you you were worthy.   He said the same thing to me. Angle on Hela in the frescos, fighting with Mjolnir.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You see, you never knew him, not at his best. (nostalgic sigh)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Odin and I drowned entire civilizations in blood and tears. Where do you think all this gold came from? And then one day he decided to become a benevolent king.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: To foster peace, to protect life. (with teeth)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: To have you.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I understand why you're angry. And you are my sister, and technically have a claim to the throne. And believe me, I would love for someone else to rule. But it can't be you. You're just...the worst. Hela puts on her headdress.

dialogues.text: You know, Father once told me that a wise king never seeks out war.

dialogues.text: To be honest, I expected more. Hela DISARMS him, sending Gungnir CLATTERING across the r Hela strikes out sending Thor FLYING hard into a wall.

dialogues.text: You'll see. Banner LEAPS out of the ship!

dialogues.text: Banner soars through the air. It's an awe-inspiring image we follow Banner's trajectory downwards. His face is determined, arms churning, ready to Hulk out... ...except it doesn't happen.     Worry washes over his fa SPLAT! Banner FACEPLANTS on the bridge, seeming to break every bone in his body. He looks dead. Pause. Fenris SNIFFS him curiously. We notice one vein on Banner's neck PUMPING GREEN. Then- -Banner suddenly EXPLODES UP as THE INCREDIBLE HULK, UPPE CUTTING Fenris in the jaw! Hulk is now in a wrestling mat with a beast four times his size - the two of them go TUMBLING into the water below.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hela has Thor by the throat.     She lifts him up to look the balcony's ledge.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You see? No one's going anywhere. (then:)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'll get that sword even if I have to kill every single one of them to do it. Thor looks down.   Distraught.   Heartsick.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Val pilots the Commodore towards the battle on the city s of the bridge. Skurge's battlion of Butchers surge forwar -BOOM! Val LANDS the Commodore on top of them, SKIDDING across the bridge, CRUSHING the front line of the Butcher and KNOCKING Skurge aside. The impact triggers the party function, setting off PARTY MUSIC and a FIREWORKS DISPLAY Val emerges from the ship in full battle mode. Behind her the Commodore FIREWORKS provide a spectacular HERO BACKDR She draws DRAGONFANG and smiles as Butchers begin swarmin towards her. She is where she needs to be. Meanwhile, the Asgardians huddle together, packed so tigh that some begin to fall off the side of the bridge, loved ones grabbing them and pulling them back up. There's no h

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Heimdall FIGHTS off Butchers, but gets KNOCKED DOWN.   Ju it looks like he's about to take a killing blow- -BAM!   The Butcher is BLASTED. Korg steps into frame, holding the blaster! KORG

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hey man.   I'm Korg.   This is Miek. Miek steps into frame, waving. KORG (CONT'D)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We're going to jump on that spaceship and get out of here. Want to come? Heimdall is beyond confused, but then... a LOUD NOISE. He looks down to see- -EMERGING FROM THE THICK LOW-HANGING FOG IS LOKI! Resplen in horns, arms spread wide, seeming to float towards the bridge like a mythical angel of mercy. LOKI

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Your savior is here! The fog dissipates around him, revealing that Loki's stan on THE GRANDMASTER'S SUPERCRUISER! For reasons that will become clear, we will henceforth call this ship THE ARK. And Loki is not alone. He's brought along all the prisone from the Contest of Champions. Armed with gladiator weapo The Ark slows to a stop at the middle of bridge. ABOVE: Even with Hela's hand on his throat, Thor can't he but smile at the sight of Loki. Hela however sneers. HELA

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That little shit. BELOW: Loki and the Sakaarian gladiators JUMP OFF the Ark onto the bridge, joining the fight against Hela's forces. LOKI

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Did you miss me?    Everybody on that ship, now. The Asgardian refugees begin POURING onto the ark. The on way onto the Ark is a narrow plankway, so there is an immediate bottleneck effect - thousands of frightened peo all pushing for a chance at salvation. It's mayhem. Loki walks through the crowd to Heimdall.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Welcome home. I saw you coming.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Of course you did. Loki joins Heimdall and the gladiators in fending off Hel encroaching minions.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hela is perturbed, but not enraged. She turns her gaze ba to Thor for a final farewell.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A valiant effort, but you never stood a chance. Thor looks up from his friends protecting his people as t frenziedly board to Ark to- -the twilight stars coming out over Asgard.   There's a glimmering of stardust in the sky.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You see?   I'm not a queen, or a monster. FLASH: PUSH IN ON ODIN AT THE CLIFFS.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm the Goddess of Death. FLASH: PUSH IN ON ODIN AT THE CLIFFS.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What were you the God of again? As Hela digs two blades into his chest, Thor SCREAMS... And everything goes SILENT. SKY. We PAN DOWN to-

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: - where we find Thor (dressed and injured as he was on th balcony), back in the sweeping fields where we met Hela f the first time.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Even when you had two eyes you were only seeing half the picture. Thor turns to see his father, sitting where we last saw h Thor falls to his knees.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She's too strong.   Without my hammer I cannot--

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Are you Thor, God of Hammers? Thor looks up, meeting his gaze.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That hammer helped you control your power, focus it. But it was never the source of your strength. Odin stands, as does Thor.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's too late. She's already taken Asgard.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Asgard is not a place. Never has been. (gestures around him)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: This could be Asgard. It is wherever our people stand. And right now those people need you. Odin turns to go.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm not as strong as you.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No.   You're stronger. As Odin turns to leave, a SHADOW in the shape of HELA'S HEADDRESS falls across him. He looks up and we are...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Thor looks up to the sky. She digs the blades deeper into Thor's chest. He groans i pain. Everything DARKENS as BLACK CLOUDS gather overhead.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Tell me brother, what were you the God of again...? CLOSE ON Thor's clenched fist, small arcs of electricity forming. -THE LOUDEST CRACK OF THUNDER YOU'VE EVER HEARD! In an instant, Thor and Hela are ENGULFED in a bolt of lightnin KA-BOOM! Hela is BLASTED OUT of the lightning and sent CRASHING into the streets of Asgard. Her costume is tattered, the black extensions of her power hanging off h body in some places. She appears to be unconscious! All around Asgard, EVERYONE looks up at this massive stri

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: BOOM! Thor LANDS HARD on his feet. Muscles swollen, veins pulsing with electricity. A living storm. Thor DIVES INTO THE FRAY. He moves like a bolt of lightni SURGING through the army of Butchers in quick SLASHING JO

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Valkyrie CHARGES into the ocean of Butchers. Wielding Dragonfang, backlit by the POPS of fireworks.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Moving across the entire epic battle. On the city side, Valkyrie CUTS A SWATHE through the relentless onslaught of Butchers. Heavy damage. At the middle of the bridge, Heimdall helps load the flee Asgardians onto the Ark. Within the melee are Loki, Korg and the Sakaarians. Loki SLASHES through Butchers wielding his two long daggers.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: In the water below, Hulk and Fenris WRESTLE in an colossa clash of FISTS, CLAWS, and TEETH. Beyond that, Thor is wielding electrified weapons and BLASTING entire packs of Butchers off the bridge! Lost in the chaos is Skurge, who sees the tides turning. throws down his axe and blends into the crowd.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Fenris has Hulk in his mouth, underwater.    Trying to dr the green goliath! Fenris' teeth PUNCTURE Hulk's skin.   He BELLOWS, THRASHI Hulk winds up and SLAMS Fenris in the snout! Fenris snaps back, revealing that-

dialogues.speaker: -THEY'VE REACHED THE REALM'S EDGE
dialogues.text: Fenris is knocked off, plummeting off of Asgard into spac Hulk grabs hold of the slippery rocks, desperately trying climb back as water pours down on him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Asgardians continue RUSHING onto the ship. In the crowd we find Skurge! He's thrown a cloak over himself and is sneaking in amongst the refugees.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Our heroes have drastically thinned down the herd of Butchers. It's pandemonium. The Ark's engines are deafening, but yo can still hear the sound of terrified people SCREAMING. Thor helps Loki to his feet.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You're late.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You're missing an eye. Valkyrie finishes off a handful of enemies, but then noti something. She WHISTLES to get the others' attention.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: This isn't over. All around the bridge, our heroes look to see- -Hela arriving at the far side of bridge.   She is seethi with power, a vision of death. Having just come out of this huge battle, they are all we and nursing injuries. Loki and Val are hurting worse than Thor. Hela walks towards them.   Menacing and deliberate. Thor, Loki, and Val step forward to protect the Asgardian They huddle together.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I think we should disband the Revengers.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hit her with a lightning blast.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I just hit her with the biggest lightning blast in the history of lightning. It did nothing.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We need to hold her off until everybody's on board.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Thor looks at the people boarding behind him. THOR

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It won't end there. The longer Hela's on Asgard the more powerful she grows. She'll hunt us down. We need to stop her here and now. VALKYRIE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What's our move? LOKI

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm not doing "Get help." Thor sees Hela approaching. He sees the palace behind her comes to a realization. THOR

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Asgard's not a place, it's a people. (then) This was never about stopping Ragnarok...it was about causing Ragnarok. (to Loki:) Go to the vault. Surtur's crown. It's the only way. LOKI

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (impressed) Bold move, brother. Even for me. Loki runs off, leaving Thor and Val to deal with Hela.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Shall we?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: After you. Thor ATTACKS. They CLASH, kicking off this monumental confrontation. Hela manifests pitch black weapons to atta Thor, but Thor is conjuring powerful bolts of electricity with the same speed and ferocity. Just as Thor is surging with newfound lightning powers, Hela's powers seem to be enhanced as well. The battle is relentless and fast-paced. Thor is holding own against Hela. Maybe they can win this thing. After several fearsome exchanges, Hela PUNCTURES his shou and then DARTS past him with startling speed.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Undeterred, Thor RUSHES Hela again.    Valkyrie joins in, forcing Hela to fight them both.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: While the Asgardians still scramble to get on board above -find the Commodore ship, swooping down below the bridge.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Find Loki in the pilot's seat.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: This is madness.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The ship ACCELERATES towards the palace of Asgard.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Thor continues FIGHTING Hela while Valkyrie BLOCKS Hela's attempts to spear the Asgardians from afar. Hela isn't landing any fatal blows, but she's carving Tho and making steady progress towards the Ark. However, the Asgardian refugees finally make it aboard. A injured Heimdall, Korg, and Miek are the last to get on. Thor and Heimdall make eye contact.    Thor calls out:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: GO!   GO NOW!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: As the Ark's engines begin to POWER UP- -Hela HARPOONS Thor.    He goes down, grimacing in pain. Hela begins to CONJURE AN ENORMOUS MANIFESTATION OF HER

dialogues.speaker: STABS THE ARK AND PREVENTS IT FROM LEAVING
dialogues.text: Butchers begin to scramble up onto the Ark!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The refugees REACT IN TERROR as the Butchers begin CLIMBI from the bridge to the Ark. In the frightened crowd we fi

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: -Skurge, still cloaked. He sees innocent Asgardians huddl together, trying to protect their families. He's having a crisis of conscience. An epiphany.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: LOKI rushes in and picks up Surtur's skull. As he walks towards the Eternal Flame, The Tesseract draw his attention. Tempting him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The first wave of Butchers arrives on board, heading stra for a cowering family. Just as they're about to be killed POW! POW! POW!    The Butchers fall dead. Everyone turns to see SKURGE, now uncloaked, wielding his M-16s from Texas.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: For Asgard. Skurge runs forward, LEAPS off the Ark, and LANDS on the bridge right where all the Butchers are coming to life. BLASTING AWAY the Butchers before they can get aboard. Behind Skurge, the Ark begins to LIFT OFF. Skurge keeps FIRING and then-

dialogues.speaker: HELA
dialogues.text: Hela turns to see Skurge blasting his way through her Butchers, trying to make his way to her. Disappointed, Hela FIRES a blade through Skurge's heart. Skurge has been killed... ...but the Ark now ASCENDS unfettered.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: LOKI places Surtur's skull in the Eternal Flame.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: With the Eternal Flame, you are reborn. As the fire CRACKLES, Surtur's skull begins to GROW.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hela has Val in her clutches, but her focus is on the aftermath of Skurge's last stand and the Ark's subsequent escape. She's furious, about to unleash hell when-

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: HELA!   Enough! Hela turns to see Thor, having yanked out the harpoon... ...and it looks like he's laying down his sword!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You want Asgard? It's yours.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Whatever game you're playing, it won't work. You can't defeat me.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No, but he can. KA-BOOM! EXPLODING through the roof of the palace is SURT This is a different Surtur than the opening. He is slowly but steadily GROWING in size, and he carries with him a massive flaming sword, which GROWS as well. Surtur's arrival literally SHAKES the bedrock of Asgard, causing FISSURES to spiderweb all around him, and DISLODG some of the foundation on the bridge and around the palac Hela's eyes go wide. She wasn't expecting this.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No...NO!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: In the background the Ark continues its ascent, now high above the city. Hela's attention is on Surtur as the palace COLLAPSES aro him. So she is unprepared for- -SHLNK! Mustering up all her remaining strength, Val DRIV Dragonfang through Hela's chest, effectively PINNING her the bridge. Refocused on Val, Hela goes to deliver a death blow when- -Thor BOLTS forward!   He PULLS Val from Hela's clutches. Thor turns and FIRES LIGHTNING INTO DRAGONFANG, which DISLODGES the section of the bridge that Hela is pinned t The ground beneath Hela BREAKS FREE and she goes FALLING into the expanding fissure in Asgard's bedrock. Badly injured, Thor and Valkyrie look up to see- -Surtur INCREASING in size, now towering over the palace.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Tremble before me Asgard, for I am your reckoning! Surtur swings his sword, destroying an entire city block. THOR and VALKYRIE look up.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The people are safe.     That's all that matters.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We're fulfilling the prophecy.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I hate this prophecy.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: So do I, but we have no choice. In the background, Hulk hops up onto the bridge.   Looks around, zeroing in on Surtur.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Surtur destroys Asgard, he destroys Hela so that our people can live.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hulk CHARGES behind them, still unseen by Thor and Val.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We need to let him finish... (finally sees Hulk)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No! HULK LEAPS UP AND LANDS ONTO SURTUR'S FACE and begins POUNDING the fire giant with furious punches!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hulk no!   Stop it you moron!! It's not doing much damage, but the shock of it plus Hulk impact makes Surtur take a destructive step back. Hulk is trying to rip out one of Surtur's horns when Surt reaches up and GRABS HIM with a giant fiery hand. Surtur HURLS Hulk away from him.   Sends him CRASHING DOW Hulk stumbles to his feet, dazed and SMOKING. After gathe his bearings, Hulk gets REALLY ANGRY and heads back towar Surtur for round two, but-

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hulk, just for once in your life, don't smash!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: But...big Monster.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hulk! Let's go. Hulk stops. Looking between Surtur and Thor & Val. Th a real Sophie's Choice for Hulk. On the one hand, he real wants to kill that thing. On the other hand...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Friends. Hulk PICKS UP Thor and Valkyrie.   He then squats down, a -LEAPS WITH ALL HIS MIGHT! The trio SHOOTS UP into the ni sky like a rocket blasting off. Their trajectory is headi right at the Ark as it reaches the lower orbit of Asgard.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hulk lands gently, as though he were stepping out of bed. casually DROPS Thor and Val, both exhausted.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A bird's eye view shows TOTAL CARNAGE AND MADNESS on Asga Surtur has grown to EXTINCTION LEVEL SCALE.   SLASHING AW the landscape below, when suddenly-

dialogues.speaker: SURTUR'S CHEST
dialogues.text: From beneath the water, Hela EXPLODES back onto the scene riding a huge spiked manifestation of her powers. She's going for Surtur.   ATTACKING with all her might. Surtur winds up, holding his sword above his head.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I am Asgard's doom!! True to his word, Surtur fulfills his destiny and-

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Everyone watches as Surtur drives his sword through Asgar

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The damage is not too bad. As long as the foundations are strong, we can rebuild this place. It will become a haven for all people and aliens of the universe... When the fiery sword touches the crystalline base of Asga there is a VIOLENT DETONATION OF ENERGY! A CATACLYSMIC EARTHQUAKE!   The entire realm is SPLIT IN In an instant, Thor's home is BLOWN TO PIECES. Asgard is gone.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nope, those foundations are gone. Sorry. Stay on Thor as he processes the decisions he's made.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What have I done?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Heimdall joins him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You saved us from extinction. Asgard is not a place, it's a people.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Ark cruises among the chaos that once was Asgard.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Thor looks at his reflection in a mirror. His wounds are bandaged, including his now missing eye. His armor is cle Thor takes a beat, as though trying to get used to the si of the man looking back at him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It suits you. Thor turns to reveal Loki standing by the door.    A smil

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Perhaps you're not so bad after all, brother.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Maybe not.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Thank you, Loki. Thor picks up a soap dish.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And if you were here, I might even give you a hug. Thor THROWS the dish at Loki.   Loki catches it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Do we have to hug now? Thor smiles.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The giant cruiseliner is gliding through space, the twink of stars all around it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Thor steps out onto the main deck to see an assembly of b Asgardian and Sakaarian refugees awaiting their King. Thor looks over his people and begins to walk through the crowd. His subjects part, allowing him through. It is the antithesis of the opening coronation from the f THOR movie. The people aren't cheering and lauding him, b rather they are smiling. Humbly bowing. Grateful. And Thor isn't acting arrogant. Not trying to show off an swagger. He is stately. A contemplative and dignified kin At the end of the procession, Hulk, Loki, Valkyrie, and Heimdall stand next to the CAPTAIN'S CHAIR.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Your throne. Pause. Reluctant acceptance. Thor sits down. Flanking him on opposite sides are Valkyrie and Heimdall. Behind/towering above them is the Hulk. Loki joins them.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: So, King of Asgard. Thor turns around to see THOUSANDS OF PEOPLE staring back silently awaiting word from their new King. Now feeling t true weight of the crown, Thor takes a moment... and then

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Where to?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm not sure. Any suggestions? Miek, what's your home planet? Angle on Korg, who is holding Miek (sans robot exoskeleto

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh, Miek's dead. I accidentally stepped on him on the bridge, I've just felt so guilty I've been carrying him around all day...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Miek WRIGGLES to life.   Korg lights up.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Miek, you're alive! He's alive everyone! What was your question?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Thor looks forward, taking charge of this one.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Earth it is.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: THOR and LOKI look out the window.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Do you really think it's a good idea to go back to Earth?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sure!   They love me there.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Let me rephrase: Do you really think it's a good idea to bring me back to Earth?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Thor smiles, getting it.    Pats Loki on the shoulder.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Probably not. But don't worry, brother...I've got a feeling that everything's going to work out.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Then through the window, they see-

dialogues.speaker: -THE MASSIVE FORM OF SANCTUARY-2, THANOS' WARSHIP
dialogues.text: approaching.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A wider view allows us to see all of Sanctuary-2, dwarfin the Ark in size. END.
